songs.title: Talk Dirty/In Paris/Run The World/Can’t Hold Us
songs.lyrics:
["Talk Dirty" Sample]
Talk dirty to me
Talk dirty to me
Talk dirty to me
Talk dirty to me
Get jazzy on it

[Verse 1: Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
I'm that flight that you get on, international
First class seat on my lap, boy, riding comfortable
'Cause I know what da girl dem need, New York to Haiti
I got lipstick stamps on my passport, I make it hard to leave

[Pre-Chorus: Jade Thirlwall and Perrie Edwards]
Been around the world, don't speak your language
But your booty don't need explaining
All I really need to understand is when you

[Chorus: Jesy Nelson]
Talk dirty to me
Talk dirty to me
Talk dirty to me
Talk dirty to me

[Verse 2: Jade Thirwall
You know the words to my song
No habla Inglés
Our conversations ain't long
But you know what is
I know what the girl dem want, London to Taiwan
I got lipstick stamps on my passport, I think I need a new one

[Pre-Chorus: Leigh-Anne Pinnock and Perrie Edwards]
Been around the world, don't speak your language
But your booty don't need explaining
All I really need to understand is when you

[Chorus: Jesy Nelson]
Talk dirty to me
Talk dirty to me
Talk dirty to me
Talk dirty to me

["In Paris" Instrumental]

[Spoken: All]
Clap, clap, hands up!
Clap, clap, hands up!
Clap, clap, hands up!

[Spoken: Jesy Nelson]
'Cause we go low, get low, lower, lower
Get low, low, low, low
Lower, lower, get lower, lower!
Lower, lower!

[Spoken: Perrie Edwards]
Now let me see you jump!

[Spoken: All]
Jump! Jump! Jump! Jump!
Jump! Jump! Jump! Jump!
Jump! Jump! Jump! Jump!
Jump! Jump! Jump! Jump!
Jump! Jump! Jump! Jump!

[Spoken: Jade Thirlwall]
Now everybody scream!

[Sung: All]
We don't stop, we go
We don't stop, we go
We don't stop, we go
We don't stop, we go
We don't stop, we go
We don't stop, we go
We don't stop, we go
We don't stop, we go

["Run The World" Instrumental]

Each backing dancer gets their own moment to dance by themselves centerstage, with the LM girls cheering them on and occasionally joining in

["Can't Hold Us" Instrumental]

[Chorus: All]
Here we go back
This is the moment
Tonight is the night
We'll fight till it's over
So we put our hands up
Like the ceiling can't hold us
Like the ceiling can't hold us

[Chorus: All]
Here we go back
This is the moment
Tonight is the night
We'll fight till it's over
So we put our hands up
Like the ceiling can't hold us
Like the ceiling can't hold us

[Bridge: All]
Na, na, na, na, na, na, na, na, hey
Na, na, na, na, na, na, na, na, hey
Na, na, na, na, na, na, na, na, hey
Na, na, na, na, na, na, na, na
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh

[Chorus: Perrie Edwards]
Here we go back
This is the moment
Tonight is the night
We'll fight till it's over
So we put our hands up
Like the ceiling can't hold us
Like the ceiling can't hold us

[Chorus: All]
Here we go back
This is the moment
Tonight is the night
We'll fight till it's over
So we put our hands up
Like the ceiling can't hold us
Like the ceiling can't hold us
